topComments.author: Abdul Askew SR
topComments.comment: We had fun this visit.  There were a few rides that were out of service.  My youngest son enjoyed himself and this was his first time to an amusement park.  He didn't care for the Wave pool but loved the lazy lagoon, the little train, everything in the kids section, Lagoona Kahuna.  I enjoyed myself as well.  I got on a couple of rides and enjoyed the Wave pool & the lazy lagoon.  Nice little outing for the family that didn't really break the bank

topComments.author: Richard Dahlstrom
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) A fam√≠lia e eu est√°vamos na √°rea e topamos com esta j√≥ia. Todos se divertiram muito nadando, brincando e encontrando al√≠vio do calor.  Com isso embora. H√° uma demanda absoluta de manuten√ß√£o para o parque como um todo .. o rio lento n√£o era nada mais do que um engarrafamento lento, a √°rea de recrea√ß√£o infantil parecia obviamente gasta, e a piscina de ondas tinha um fundo t√£o √°spero nas √°reas que cortei meu p√©.  A manuten√ß√£o geral poderia ser negligenciada como estava no final da temporada, mas o que n√£o poderia ser o √≥bvio desprezo da equipe de salva-vidas. Eles passaram mais tempo agrupados conversando do que assistindo suas piscinas e aqueles que fingiam prestar aten√ß√£o apitaram para tudo, mas para nenhuma a√ß√£o para corrigir o comportamento que estavam observando.  Este parque aqu√°tico funcionar√° absolutamente em apuros, mas dada a oportunidade para qualquer outra coisa, eu recomendo que voc√™ fa√ßa qualquer outra coisa.  (Original) The family and I were in the area and stumbled upon this gem.  Everyone had a great time swimming, playing, and all around finding relief from the heat.  With that though.  There is an absolute demand for maintenance to the park as a whole .. the lazy river was nothing more than a lazy traffic jam, the kids play area looked obviously worn out, and the wave pool had such a rough bottem in areas I cut my foot.  The general maintenance could be overlooked as it was towards the end of the season but what could not is the obvious disregard of the lifeguard staff. They spent more time clustered together talking than they did watching their pools and the ones that were pretending to pay attention blew their whistle for everything but to no action to correct the behavior they were observing.  This water park will absolutely work in a pinch but given the opportunity for anything else I would recommend you do anything else.

topComments.author: Silena Peterson
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Meu √∫nico problema foi a piscina Wave üåä. Cheguei l√° √†s 14h30, sem ondas, e a m√°quina s√≥ voltou √†s 16h30. Smh. Fiquei desapontado com as crian√ßas e por ter sido um fim de semana do Memorial Day. Muitos salva-vidas, mas sem ondas. As pessoas que estamos cantando giram nas ondas, mas isso n√£o aconteceu. 2 horas foi muito longo para n√£o fornecer Waves pelo pre√ßo que voc√™ paga. Espero que eles intensifiquem o jogo ou eu irei para outro lugar .. Ok !!! üëçüèº  (Original) My only Problem was the Wave üåä pool.  I got there at 2:30 no Waves,, an the Machine didn't come back on until about 4:30. Smh. I was Disappointed for the kids & for it to have been a memorial Day weekend. Lots of Lifeguards but No Waves. People we're chanting turn on the waves, but that didn't happen. 2 hrs was way too long Not to provide Waves for the Price you pay. I hope they step up there game or I will be going elsewhere..  Okay!!! üëçüèº

topComments.author: Yvette Jones
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) O parque era um lugar muito divertido de se estar, era muito limpo, a equipe era muito profissional e eu vou l√° com muita frequ√™ncia  (Original) The park was a very fun place to be, it was very clean, the staff was very professional and I'm going to go there very often

topComments.author: Oluwafemi Mora
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) O lugar √© muito legal. √â um parque pequeno se compararmos com outros. Estacionamento gratuito. √â um local de divers√£o para todas as idades. O que eu gostei foi que os banhos e toda a √°rea eram muito limpos. Percebo que a equipe est√° sempre limpando ao redor. A piscina de ondas est√° ligada e desligada, demora um pouco para voltar. Os funcion√°rios s√£o simp√°ticos e educados. Fui em um dia de semana, n√£o muito cheio. Eles t√™m chuveiros, mas a √°gua estava extremamente fria. Os ingressos n√£o s√£o muito caros, mas os pre√ßos dentro s√£o pouco altos. Definitivamente vou visitar novamente.  (Original) The place is very nice. Is a small park if we compare to others. Free parking.Is a place to have fun for all ages.  What I liked was that baths and all area was very clean. I notice that the staff is always cleaning around. The wave pool is on & off , it take a little long time to go back on. The staff are nice n polite. I went on a week day, not too crowded. They have showers, but the water was extremely cold. Tickets not too expensive,  but prices inside little high. Definitely I will visit again.

topComments.author: Karen Joseph
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Este foi um lugar perfeito para passar um dia relaxante! O Splash World √© um pequeno parque aqu√°tico, mas que mant√©m as multid√µes baixas, ent√£o n√£o houve longas esperas pelos passeios aqu√°ticos. O rio lento era a temperatura e a velocidade perfeitas para uma flutua√ß√£o tranquila! O parque √© limpo e a equipe √© muito simp√°tica e prestativa. Eu definitivamente voltarei aqui novamente.  (Original) This was a perfect place to spend a relaxing day!  Splash World is a small waterpark, but that keeps the crowds down, so there were no long waits for the water rides. The lazy river was the perfect temperature and speed for a restful float! The park is clean and the staff is very friendly and helpful.  I'll definitely go back here again.

topComments.author: Ebony Harcum
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Todos os passeios ainda n√£o est√£o abertos. O mundo Splash era bom. Aproveitei meu tempo l√°. O bolo do funil foi frito com muita for√ßa. Mas, no geral, estou feliz que eles tenham sido reabertos. Esperan√ßosamente, tudo estar√° aberto e em pleno vigor em breve.  (Original) All the rides aren't open yet. Splash world was nice. Enjoyed my time there. Funnel cake was fried too hard. But overall, I'm glad they are opened back up. Hopefully everything will be open and in full effect soon.

topComments.author: Lorraine Soto
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) 2¬™ vez aqui em 10 anos. Alguns passeios foram fechados. A piscina de ondas √© √≥tima, muito tempo para esperar pelos slides.  (Original) 2nd time here in 10years.   Couple of the rides were closed.  Wave pool is great, too long to wait for the slides.

topComments.author: Mika M
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Metade dos passeios foram fechados. A √°rea de ondas (principal atra√ß√£o em seu site) foi fechada durante o dia. As pessoas s√£o rudes com poucas exce√ß√µes. Sem espa√ßo pessoal. Sem respeito √†s voltas. √Ågua n√£o limpa. A √°rea de estar √© limitada em compara√ß√£o com o n√∫mero de pessoas permitidas no parque. N√£o vai novamente.  (Original) Half of the rides were closed. Wave area (main attraction in their website) was closed for the day. People are rude with few exceptions. No personal space. No respect to turns. Water not clean. Seating area is limited comparing to number of people allowed in the park. Will not go again.

topComments.author: John Davidson (ParksWithPoints)
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Infelizmente, eles n√£o me deixaram usar meu passe de temporada IB porque eu n√£o o tinha fisicamente. Mesmo depois de conversar com um gerente e meu e-mail escanear e mostrar pago. Claramente n√£o renovando esse passe no pr√≥ximo ano.  (Original) Sadly they wouldn't let me use my IB season pass because I didn't physically have it. Even after talking with a manager and my email scanning and showing paid.  Clearly not renewing that pass next year.

topComments.author: Brian Brooks
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Nenhum dos passeios s√£o reparados por qualquer pessoa com algum conhecimento sobre como faz√™-lo, s√£o simplesmente corre√ß√µes de "fita adesiva e supercola". Seu objetivo √© colocar o m√≠nimo de dinheiro poss√≠vel para consertar seu parque e ganhar o m√°ximo de dinheiro com isso. Por favor, n√£o desperdice seu dinheiro com este risco de seguran√ßa de um parque e leve suas fam√≠lias para outro lugar. ALGUNS DESSES PASSEIOS N√ÉO S√ÉO CONSERVADOS ADEQUADAMENTE H√Å MAIS DE 25 ANOS!!!  (Original) None of the rides are repaired by anyone with any knowledge on how to do so, they're simply "duct tape and super glue" fixes. Their goal is to put as little money into fixing their park as possible and to make as much money doing so. Please do not waste your money at this safety hazard of a park and take your families elsewhere. SOME OF THESE RIDES HAVENT BEEN PROPERLY SERVICED IN OVER 25 YEARS!!!

topComments.author: King_salaam_88
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Planejei uma viagem neste domingo com a fam√≠lia. As crian√ßas adoraram o aspecto do parque aqu√°tico, o que √© uma vantagem para mim, porque, desde que estejam correndo soltos, tudo √© bom para dormir mais tarde. A comida era agrad√°vel com o suporte de cabana de pizza e suporte de taco de birria sendo um dos melhores que j√° tive. Mas voltando ao parque em geral. Muito pouco em termos de atra√ß√µes do parque aqu√°tico para adultos. Ter uma piscina de ondas com ondas t√£o pequenas √© triste. No geral, eles tinham muito pouco ou nenhum passeio seco aberto ou diziam que ainda estavam trabalhando. V√°rios passeios infantis n√£o estavam funcionando devido aos funcion√°rios terem que assistir e correr 3 ou mais sozinhos ou ningu√©m os executando. √Äs vezes, eles n√£o estavam contando quantas pessoas deveriam contar e continuavam contando. Aconteceu umas 4 vezes seguidas. N√£o pretendo voltar, pois posso ir a muitos outros parques de divers√µes (sim, provavelmente gaste um pouco mais), mas saiba que haver√° muita variedade para todas as idades, a maioria ou todos estar√£o correndo, e a comida ser√° t√£o boa .  (Original) Planned a trip this Sunday with the family.  Kids loved the water park aspect which is a plus for me because as long as they are running wild it's all good for sleepy time later. The food was pleasant with the pizza hut stand and birria taco stand being one of the best I've had. But back to the park in general. Very little in terms of water park attractions for adults. To have a wave pool with so little waves is sad. Overall they had very little to any dry rides open or were said to still be getting work done. Several kids rides weren't running due to employees having to watch and run 3 or more by themselves or no one running them at all. At times they weren't taking count of how many people to let on and kept over counting. Happened like 4 times in a row.  Don't plan on going back as I can go to many other amusement Parks( yes prolly spend a little more) but know there will be plenty of variety for all ages, most or all will be running, and the food will be as good.

topComments.author: Iryna Pastavalava
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) O parque √© razo√°vel, lugar familiar agrad√°vel. Atendimento ao cliente n√£o √© ok. Alguns funcion√°rios na entrada s√£o rudes. Estou vindo com o beb√™ e me sinto incomodada. Tudo que eu quero √© que minha mochila de beb√™ n√£o seja tocada, estou ansiosa para abri-la eu mesma. E traga √°gua para o meu beb√™. A pol√≠tica sobre a √°gua n√£o √© clara. √â a minha 5¬™ vez este ano. Toda vez que eu venho, eles me falam verbalmente algo diferente.  (Original) The park is reasonable, nice family place. Customer service is not O'k. Some employees at the entrance are rude. I am coming with the baby, and I feel being bothered. All I want is my baby backpack not to be touched, I am eager to open it myself. And bring water for my baby. The policy on water is not clear. It's my 5th time this year. Every time I come, they verbally tell me something different.

topComments.author: Yvette
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Nem todos os passeios a oeste abriram devido √† chuva.  (Original) Not all the rides west opened due to the rain.

topComments.author: David A
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) √ìtimo parque. A parte do parque aqu√°tico √© melhor imho. **edit** alterou a revis√£o para tr√™s em vez de 5 estrelas at√© que consertem a perigosa montanha-russa hellcat. Les√µes como bater cabe√ßas, hemorragias nasais e chicotadas s√£o comuns. Passeio muito inst√°vel.  (Original) Great park. The water park part is better imho. **edit** changed review to three instead of 5 star until they fix the dangerous hellcat roller coaster. Injuries such as banging heads, nosebleeds, and whiplashes are common. Very shaky ride.

topComments.author: Keith Nelson
topComments.comment: Complete waste of $80.... all the rides were broken down and not running and the few that were, barely operated the way they should. the employees manning the rides looked like they'd rather kill themselves than be where they were, food options absolutely lacking how many different food vendors do you need selling only hotdogs and hamburgers? place is dirty and just all in all run down.

topComments.author: Felicia Dousharm
topComments.comment: It opened up the water rides a week early for the 1st hot weekend of the season. Lines weren't too bad as long as you bought tix online. Overall the pricing is best with a season pass. You'll get your money's worth on your 2nd visit.

topComments.author: Beth Jackson
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Bom, n√£o sei por onde come√ßar. Eu acho que o pre√ßo √© muito alto para entrar. Eu realmente acho que $ 40 √© muito para o que eles oferecem! A comida e as bebidas eram muito caras, ent√£o eu sugiro que voc√™ leve um almo√ßo e lanches, porque eles permitem que voc√™ saia e volte, desde que voc√™ tenha sua m√£o carimbada e seja revistada novamente e n√£o traga o que voc√™ tirou. A garrafa de √°gua de 16 on√ßas me custou US $ 3. A equipe n√£o √© muito profissional ou amig√°vel. Isso ocorre porque eles s√£o principalmente muito jovens. Era limpo e arrumado na maioria das √°reas. Os banheiros estavam molhados, mas devem ser devido √†s pessoas mudando ap√≥s o parque aqu√°tico. Percebi que a equipe andava descontente com outros clientes e ou uns com os outros. Eu teria dado a eles 3 estrelas, mas eles salvaram meu filho da hist√≥ria verdadeira do perigo, ent√£o eu dei as 5 estrelas! Eu os vi salvar outra garotinha tamb√©m! A equipe √© jovem e n√£o a mais bonita, mas eles foram muito vigilantes e parecem levar a seguran√ßa a s√©rio. Digo isso porque meu filho pegou o tubo errado (ele pegou um tubo interno infantil quando deveria ter pegado o de adultos para um dos passeios aqu√°ticos) e os param√©dicos vieram do nada para faz√™-lo pegar o certo tubo. Mas isso foi depois que eles ficaram l√° um tempo dizendo que eu tenho que parar o cara com o tubo amarelo, mas eu n√£o estou com vontade de subir todos esses degraus. Ent√£o o cara entrou em a√ß√£o subindo os degraus. Ele deixou seus dois compadres para tr√°s. Ent√£o eu disse a eles, ei, desculpe-me, e o cara com o tubo amarelo? Aquele √© meu filho! Lol, eles o salvaram, ent√£o isso vale 5 estrelas! De qualquer forma, meu filho e sobrinho se divertiram muito. As filas eram inexistentes e eles estavam super felizes o tempo todo. Tamb√©m vale 5 estrelas!  (Original) Well I don‚Äôt know where to start. I think the price is too high to get in. I really think $40 is a lot for what they offer! The food and drinks were overpriced so I suggest you pack a lunch and snacks because  they let you leave and come back as long as you get your hand stamped and get searched again and don‚Äôt bro g whatever you took out in. But fyi One 16oz bottle of water cost me $3. The staff isn‚Äôt very professional or friendly at all. This is because they are mostly very young. It was neat and clean in most areas. The bathrooms were wet but they have to be due to people changing after the water park. I Noticed staff walking around disgruntled with other patrons and or each other.  I would have given them 3 stars but they saved my son from danger true story so I gave the 5 stars! I saw them save another little girl too! The staff is young and not the nicest  BUT THEY were very watchful and seem to take safety serious. I say this because my son took the wrong  tube (he took a child inner-tube when he should‚Äôve gotten the one for adults for one of the water rides) and the EMTs came from out of nowhere to get him to get the right tube. But that was after they stood there a while saying I gotta stop the guy with the yellow tube but I don‚Äôt feel like going up  all those steps. Then the guy sprung into action running up the steps. He left his two compadres behind. So I said to them hey excuse me what about the guy with the yellow tube? That‚Äôs my son! Lol they saved him though so that‚Äôs worth 5 stars! Anyway my son and nephew had a really good time. The lines were nonexistent and they were super happy the entire time. Also worth 5 stars!

topComments.author: Precious Garcia
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) O parque aqu√°tico foi um bom entretenimento para nossos 3 anos de idade. Um bom neg√≥cio por um pre√ßo baixo. O parque de divers√µes estava um pouco vazio, o que era bom‚Ä¶at√© chegarmos √† montanha russa.  Quase logo ap√≥s a primeira gota, senti uma dor lancinante no pesco√ßo. Chicote. Eu mordi minha l√≠ngua, que estava em mim, mas eles n√£o lhe disseram o qu√£o dif√≠cil o passeio o derruba, ou qu√£o duro e brusco √©. N√£o parece estruturalmente s√≥lido. Assim como quando voc√™ desliza para o acostamento da estrada, de repente voc√™ pode sentir solavancos onde havia suavidade esperada. Parecia inseguro, e meu pesco√ßo doendo junto com a dor de cabe√ßa retumbante depois efetivamente terminou o dia. Minha irm√£, que fez o passeio comigo, tamb√©m reclamou de extrema dor no pesco√ßo. O resto do parque foi fant√°stico, mas eles precisam trabalhar naquela montanha-russa antes de deixar mais algu√©m nela.  Editando para acrescentar, fui diagnosticado com chicotada ao ligar para o meu m√©dico e ter uma consulta emergencial de tele-sa√∫de. Ele recomendou que eu fosse ao hospital para verificar tudo, mas eu estava apenas cansada e com dor e terminei o dia. Fui informado por algu√©m que a montanha-russa √© extremamente antiga, e acho que isso encheu meu apetite por este lugar permanentemente. N√£o voltarei e tamb√©m n√£o recomendarei.  (Original) The water park was good entertainment for our 3 year old. A good deal for a low price. The amusement park was a bit empty which was nice‚Ä¶until we got to the rollercoaster.  Almost right after the first drop, I felt a searing pain in my neck. Whiplash. I bit my tongue, which was on me, but they didn‚Äôt tell you how hard the ride drops you, or how harsh and jerky it is. It doesn‚Äôt feel structurally sound. Much like when you drift to the side of the road, you could suddenly feel bumps where there was expected smoothness. It felt unsafe, and my neck aching along with the resounding headache afterwards effectively ended the day. My sister, who rode the ride with me, also complained of extreme neck pain. The rest of the park was fantastic, but they need to work on that rollercoaster before they let anyone else on it.  Editing to add, I was diagnosed with whiplash upon calling my doctor and having an emergent tele-health appointment. He recommended I go to the hospital to get everything full check out, but I was just tired and in pain and done with the day. I was informed by someone that roller coaster is extremely old, and I think that‚Äôs filled my appetite for this place permanently. Will not being coming back, and won‚Äôt be recommending it either.

topComments.author: Kahree Taylor
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Ficar longe!!!! Atualmente estou aqui Em uma fila em que estive nos √∫ltimos 1 ano e meio, esperando para pedir comida!!!! O servi√ßo √© muito lento e aparentemente √© hora do intervalo, porque todos os funcion√°rios est√£o pulando na frente da fila e pedindo comida literalmente olhando para voc√™ enquanto eles pegam sua comida e saem! ! ! ! ! Desrespeitoso!!! h√° lugares de comida que s√≥ est√£o aceitando dinheiro e n√£o avisando at√© voc√™ chegar at√© a frente... Esta √© a nossa segunda linha.... √â necess√°rio caixa eletr√¥nico quando voc√™ chegar aqui. taxa de $ 3. Oh eu disse como a √∫nica parte ativa do parque hoje √© o parque aqu√°tico ..... ummmmmmm o parque regular √© pouco ativo!!!! Estou aqui desde as 11:30 e estou pronto para ir e n√£o voltar! Oh, eu seria rude se n√£o dissesse que o uso do arm√°rio o dia todo e o estacionamento gratuito eram os melhores ...  (Original) Stay away!!!! I'm currently here In a  line I've been in for the last 1 and half, waiting to order food!!!! Service is very slow and it's apparently break time because allll the staff have been jumping in front of line and ordering food literally looking you in the face while they get their food and leave!!!!! Disrespectful!!! there are food places that are only taking cash and not telling you until you get allll the way to the front... This is our second line.... Atm is needed when you get here. $3 fee. Oh did I say how the only active part of the park today is the water park.....ummmmmmm the regular park is barely active!!!! Been here since 11:30 and I'm ready to go and not return! Oh I would be rude if I didn't say that the all day locker usage and free parking was the best... And the kid water stuff
